Topic.Title: What per cent of companies pay all of annual 401 contibution at year end?

Message.Msg: I am still bothered by the decision to pay all the 401 contribution year end. It doesn't save that much and is a perceived hit to employees. Shareholders, employees, customers, and the public all have to share in the company output if a company is to grow and thrive.

Message.Title: Daniels retires before the s77t hits the fan
Message.Msg: Not a good sign, when first week of the year , your best executive is getting out while the getting is still good, Rev numbers was this guy's thing, I'm thinking there is a big miss coming for the qtr I'm sure alot of Company put off there spending until the FC was resolved, and at that it was only half #$%$ resolved, thanks to the senate and congress
chp sector down? Exec retirement. I anticipate good performance versus DOW on Monday. Who knows.
